channel.title: Website on PINKPIG
channel.description: Recent content in Website on PINKPIG

item.title: Website update log-2
item.description:
I have uploaded the Module wise requirement analysis documentation page

The modification of the Gantt chart has failed. The message contains markdown encoding, making it impossible to draw the Gantt chart and use the HTML plugin

The transformation of the external Gantt chart failed. The external HTML is global code, and modifying it would result in manually crossing the Gantt chart every time it is clicked, which is unacceptable

item.title: Website update log-1
item.description:
Replace all text on the website with Chinese

Add Gantt chart in the bottom right corner, click to enlarge

Upload two documents: Project Use Case Diagram and Module Division, and Analysis of Patient UI Requirements

Added team member introduction, click on the details of the team members on the member page to view
